C

checkForShipOffGrid(Ship) - Method in class battleship.ShipSetupFrame
Checks to see if the ship is off the grid, if so calls returnShipToStart to move ship back to starting position.
checkForShipOverLap(Ship) - Method in class battleship.ShipSetupFrame
Checks to see if the ship overlaps another.
